div.div: Check out the Ontario County Sheriff's App on Android and IOS. Read More

The Ontario County Sheriff's Office now has the â€œHandle with Careâ€ Registry to better assist first responders in addressing the unique needs of individuals with conditions such as Autism, Down Syndrome, Alzheimer's, Dementia, and Substance Abuse. Read More

Prepared Live has helped protect over 35 million American citizens in cities around the country. Ontario County is proud to be one of the very first County PSAPs in New York State to offer such an advancement in 9-1-1 service to those in need. Read More
